createcell.name: CreateCell

createcrossaccountauthorization.description: Grants permission to create a cross account authorization

createrecoverygroup.description: Grants permission to create a recovery group

createresourceset.name: CreateResourceSet
createresourceset.description: Grants permission to create a resource set

deletecell.name: DeleteCell
deletecell.description: Grants permission to delete a cell

deletecrossaccountauthorization.name: DeleteCrossAccountAuthorization
deletecrossaccountauthorization.description: Grants permission to delete a cross account authorization

deletereadinesscheck.name: DeleteReadinessCheck
deletereadinesscheck.description: Grants permission to delete a readiness check

deleteresourceset.name: DeleteResourceSet
deleteresourceset.description: Grants permission to delete a resource set

getarchitecturerecommendations.name: GetArchitectureRecommendations
getarchitecturerecommendations.description: Grants permission to get architecture recommendations for a recovery group

getcell.name: GetCell
getcell.description: Grants permission to get information about a cell

getcellreadinesssummary.name: GetCellReadinessSummary
getcellreadinesssummary.description: Grants permission to get a readiness summary for a cell

getreadinesscheck.name: GetReadinessCheck
getreadinesscheck.description: Grants permission to get information about a readiness check

getreadinesscheckresourcestatus.name: GetReadinessCheckResourceStatus
getreadinesscheckresourcestatus.description: Grants permission to get the readiness status for an individual resource

getreadinesscheckstatus.name: GetReadinessCheckStatus
getreadinesscheckstatus.description: Grants permission to get the status of a readiness check (for a resource set)

getrecoverygroup.name: GetRecoveryGroup
getrecoverygroup.description: Grants permission to get information about a recovery group

getrecoverygroupreadinesssummary.name: GetRecoveryGroupReadinessSummary
getrecoverygroupreadinesssummary.description: Grants permission to get a readiness summary for a recovery group

getresourceset.name: GetResourceSet
getresourceset.description: Grants permission to get information about a resource set

listcrossaccountauthorizations.name: ListCrossAccountAuthorizations
listcrossaccountauthorizations.description: Grants permission to list cross account authorizations

listreadinesschecks.name: ListReadinessChecks
listreadinesschecks.description: Grants permission to list readiness checks

listrecoverygroups.name: ListRecoveryGroups
listrecoverygroups.description: Grants permission to list recovery groups

listresourcesets.name: ListResourceSets
listresourcesets.description: Grants permission to list resource sets

listrules.name: ListRules
listrules.description: Grants permission to list readiness rules

listtagsforresources.name: ListTagsForResources
listtagsforresources.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add a tag to a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a resource
